data.title: U & I (English translation)
data.meta_description: Hokago Tea Time - U & I lyrics (Japanese) + English translation: When you are not around, I feel a tiny bit worried / Who will cook the food for me righ
data.text:
When you are not around, I feel a tiny bit worried

Who will cook the food for me right now?

So then I sat here, waiting for you to come back home

Ready to hug you and smile…

And right now, I think I’ve come to realize

To see you smiling makes this all worthwhile

And your voice, that I’ve loved since the very start

Have always been with me, here inside my heart!

So right now, here I am, facing all the odds

Giving all my best to keep myself alive

Cause I want you to see, how much I have grown

And I just want to prove how much I loved you so

Whether under the sun, or the freezing rain

You were always there when I was weak not strong

So whenever I go, I know you are there

From warm days to cold night

When you are not around, I’m confused on what to do

I even mistaken sugar for soy sauce

And here I was planning to make a big surprise for you

When you come back home

And I think that I have been spoiled too much

Because you are giving everything I want

And right now I cannot even pay you back

For the kindness you have shown me from the start

You being by my side was my salvation

And I thought that we’ll be always together

And that you will stay as the days go by

The reality has slapped me very hard

I’m sorry that I’ve just only realized

That it is not the case since the very start

So I have some words, to say here right now

“Thank you very much”

Will these words, reach your heart, if I sing right now

And I’m not so sure of myself right now but

Don’t laugh, okay? Please listen to me

‘Cause I am gonna put my feelings into this

I would like to give you all my gratitude

And I will send it to you through this grateful song

I’ll cook up my rice and swallow my pride

For things will be alright
